statements: SELECT * FROM VisitorFeedback
SELECT visitor_name, rating, timestamp FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT cultural_experience, review FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE cultural_experience = 'Art'
SELECT feedback_id, visitor_name, rating FROM VisitorFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT visitor_name, review FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, rating, timestamp FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE cultural_experience = 'Art' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, cultural_experience FROM VisitorFeedback GROUP BY cultural_experience;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT visitor_name, cultural_experience, review FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY visitor_name, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM visitor_feedback;
SELECT visitor_name, rating FROM visitor_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT experience_name, location FROM cultural_experiences ORDER BY experience_name ASC;
SELECT visitor_name, rating, experience_type FROM visitor_feedback WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY visitor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM visitor_feedback WHERE experience_type = 'Historical' AND rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM visitor_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY visitor_name ASC, feedback_id DESC;

SELECT experience_id, experience_name, location, DATE_FORMAT(date_visited, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM cultural_experiences WHERE date_visited >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_visited DESC, experience_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback_count, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM visitor_feedback;

SELECT visitor_name, experience_name, location, rating, feedback_text FROM visitor_feedback JOIN cultural_experiences ON visitor_feedback.visitor_id = cultural_experiences.visitor_id WHERE rating < 4 ORDER BY visitor_name ASC, experience_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT experience_type FROM visitor_feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY experience_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM VisitorFeedback;
SELECT visitor_name, rating FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE visitor_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM CulturalExperiences ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT experience_name, category FROM CulturalExperiences WHERE duration_hours < 3;
SELECT * FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY visitor_name ASC;
SELECT experience_name, location, category FROM CulturalExperiences WHERE duration_hours < 3 ORDER BY experience_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_text FROM VisitorFeedback JOIN Reviews ON VisitorFeedback.feedback_id = Reviews.feedback_id WHERE overall_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM Reviews WHERE review_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT experience_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM CulturalExperiences JOIN Reviews ON CulturalExperiences.experience_id = Reviews.experience_id GROUP BY experience_name ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, name, email FROM VisitorFeedback ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, location, category FROM CulturalExperience WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT id, name, country FROM Visitor WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, name, rating, feedback FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM Visitor WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM CulturalExperience WHERE location = 'Paris' AND category = 'Art' ORDER BY id;
SELECT feedback FROM VisitorFeedback WHERE id = 3;
SELECT title, description, location FROM CulturalExperience WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email FROM visitor WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT experience_name, location, genre FROM experience WHERE genre = 'Adventure';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, experience_name, visit_date FROM visitor JOIN visit ON visitor.visitor_id = visit.visitor_id JOIN experience ON visit.experience_id = experience.experience_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, visitor_email FROM visitor WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT experience_name, location, genre FROM experience WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM review WHERE review_id = 3;
SELECT visitor_name, experience_name FROM visitor INNER JOIN visit ON visitor.visitor_id = visit.visitor_id INNER JOIN experience ON visit.experience_id = experience.experience_id;
